title: Why are Kim Taehyung solo stans the most toxic stans in K-pop? - Quora

response.answer_text: As a Taehyung/OT7/TaeJoonGi enthusiast stan, I don’t think we’re toxic. If we are then we aren’t the only stans in Bangtan (and kpop) who are toxic. Personally I think Blinks are the most toxic because I got bullied by a few of the toxic stans that made me stop listening to BlackPink as a whole (Yeah ik “stan the group, not the fandom” but it was hard for me to get back into their music after what happened. Back to Taehyung). Some might just be protective over him since he’s been getting a lot of hate recently (for no reason might I add. Other members have been getting hate as well and it’s not okay either) or maybe they’re just a straight up delulu stan that might think that if they save him from some kind of trouble then he’ll “fall in love” with them and they’ll live happily ever after. Idfk- either way I just wish the toxicity between the stans in ARMY would end and we can just enjoy the boys company and content they give us.

They might not be the most toxic solo stans in K-Pop. Honestly I thought Lisa stans was the most toxic(not trying to come for yaw I’m no Blink so I don’t really know for sure). But I do find a lot of them annoying. Eversince V won that most handsome face title they seem to think that it is a fact like no honey. I love V and he’s my bias in BTS,but beauty is subjective. Just because people don’t find him the most handsome or find him not attractive at all doesn’t mean you guys get all offended and wanna go on a murder spree if people don’t agree with you solo stans. That’s all. I know all of you guys are not like this,but the ones that I have encountered with…Lord have mercy.
